description: Explore what drives the way you communicate and develop communication strategies for successful communication in diverse settings.

courseName: Digital Marketing: Storytelling in the New Communication Landscape
description: Get under the bonnet of social media and explore digital storytelling with Dines, founder and creative director of Studio Blup.

courseName: University Preparation Course: Getting Ready for Success at University
description: Reflect on the differences between university and school or college education and get prepared for success.

courseName: Fashion and Sustainability: Understanding Luxury Fashion in a Changing World
description: Get an introduction to issues, agendas and contexts relating to fashion and sustainability in a changing world.

courseName: Nature Connectedness with the University of Derby
description: Learn to establish a new relationship with nature to help improve your wellbeing and tackle larger issues such as climate change.

courseName: Foundations of Spanish for Global Communication
description: Suitable even for beginners, this course from the Modern Language Centre will get you well versed in the art of speaking Spanish.

courseName: Electrical Engineering: Sensing, Powering and Controlling
description: Get a taste of an electrical engineering degree. Build your confidence in communicating ideas and using technical vocabulary.
